C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Prevent containers from allowing command execution

command:
until mysql -h twgc-database-svc -u twgc -ptwgc@NCHC  --execute "use twgc;"  > /dev/null 2>&1; do
    if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then
        echo "wait for DB ready"
        sleep 5
    fi
done
initContainers.name: wait-for-mysql
